It comes with most of the features we've come to expect from a phablet, including 6GB RAM and 128GB ROM storage equipped with Android 9 Pie and 4380mAh big capacity battery so that you can play games faster.  5.84-inch FHD+ Screen Blackview BV9700 Pro features FHD+ 18:9 Screen, which has better visual impact, makes photos, videos, and all your other content look as vibrant as real life. Ultra-Power Saving mode lets you keep your phone powered on for longer in between charges. IP68 & IP69K Waterproof and Dustproof The design and rugged features of the BV9700 Pro is IP68 & IP69K certified, ensuring protection against dust that may harm the equipment. Air Quality Detection  BV9700 Pro can be used to measure the indoor air quality in your environment. It could also be used to measure the ambient temperature and humidity level. Glonass and GPS Dual Navigation System GPS and Glonass dual satellite positioning technology, BV9500 can receive both of the signals at the same time for more accurate positioning. Even able to meet the requirements of the complex environmental operations under severe shading conditions. Fingerprint ID and Face Unlock Keep Your Phone Secure You can use both the fingerprint scanner and face ID to unlock your phone safe and fast.
